author: Wang, Jennifer R and Gramling, Sarah JB and Goldstein, David P and Cheng, Dangxiao and Chen, Duoduo and Azad, Abul K and Tse, Alvina and Hon, Henrique and Chen, Zhuo and Mirshams, Maryam and others
title: Association of two BRM promoter polymorphisms with head and neck squamous cell carcinoma risk
